Description:
Failed to generate folder-based document from attached report.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Using codes below:
archive = new FolderArchiveWriter(reportdocument);
IReportRunnable report = engine.openReportDesign(reportdesign);
IRunTask runTask = engine.createRunTask(report);
runTask.setAppContext(new HashMap());
runTask.run(archive);
runTask.close();

Result:
严重: Failed to save the core stream!
